QuestData.Title: The Secrets of Gorgrond
QuestData.Description: Commander, Yrel and Maraad have a tactical suggestion.$b$bThey recommend a small expedition group be sent into the savage wastelands of Gorgrond far to the north.$b$bReports from their rangari suggest that land may hold ancient secrets or primal knowledge that we might use to exploit weaknesses in the Iron Horde that our enemy would not expect.$b$bIf you wish to go I will have a gryphon prepared for you at once.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek Yrel at the Wildwood Wash in Gorgrond. Speak with your Garrison Gryphon Master to fly there.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to Gorgrond, Commander. We only just arrived ourselves.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Dungar Longdrink to fly to Gorgrond
